Punch.help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Arm_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
